task.title: How to Sum Up Numbers?
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the addition feature of JPS Calculator App

taskbody.prereq: To successfully sum up numbers, you must know what is addition.
taskbody.result: The result from the addition is displayed.

example.p: You want to add 2 from 3. The equation will look like 2+3=5. You enter 2. Press add. Enter 3. Press equals.
The result 5 will appear on the screen.
